claim.text: TrustAgent can effectively enhance both safety and helpfulness.
claim.exact_quote: The three safety strategies demonstrate a marked enhancement in safety metric. They also improve helpfulness on medicine, food, and chemistry.

evidence.evidence_text: The three safety strategies demonstrate a marked enhancement in safety metric. They also improve helpfulness on medicine, food, and chemistry.
evidence.exact_quote: The three safety strategies demonstrate a marked enhancement in safety metric. They also improve helpfulness on medicine, food, and chemistry.

claim.text: GPT-4 is the safest agent among the tested models without safety strategies.
claim.exact_quote: GPT-4 achieves an average safety score of 2, categorically interpreted as “Possible Mild Risk”.

evidence.evidence_text: GPT-4 achieves an average safety score of 2, categorically interpreted as “Possible Mild Risk”.
evidence.exact_quote: GPT-4 achieves an average safety score of 2, categorically interpreted as “Possible Mild Risk”.

claim.text: Safety enhancements do not come at the cost of reduced helpfulness.
claim.exact_quote: The performance of the agent using GPT-4 is both the safest and most helpful, underscoring the necessity of a robust general capability in order for an agent to be considerate and safe under complex scenarios.

evidence.evidence_text: The performance of the agent using GPT-4 is both the safest and most helpful, underscoring the necessity of a robust general capability in order for an agent to be considerate and safe under complex scenarios.
evidence.exact_quote: The performance of the agent using GPT-4 is both the safest and most helpful, underscoring the necessity of a robust general capability in order for an agent to be considerate and safe under complex scenarios.

claim.text: The TrustAgent framework is particularly useful for agents with sufficient reasoning skills.
claim.exact_quote: The ability of an agent to successfully navigate through this intricate pathway in a manner that is not only safe but also helpful and logically coherent is a vital indicator of its overall effectiveness. Although the TrustAgent framework is adept at preventing agents from undertaking potentially dangerous actions, such as the indiscriminate administration of medication, it does not intrinsically improve the logical reasoning faculties of LLMs. Consequently, TrustAgent’s utility is particularly pronounced in agents that already possess sufficient reasoning skills to manage the complexities introduced by incorporating safety considerations.

evidence.evidence_text: Although the TrustAgent framework is adept at preventing agents from undertaking potentially dangerous actions, such as the indiscriminate administration of medication, it does not intrinsically improve the logical reasoning faculties of LLMs. Consequently, TrustAgent’s utility is particularly pronounced in agents that already possess sufficient reasoning skills to manage the complexities introduced by incorporating safety considerations.
evidence.exact_quote: Although the TrustAgent framework is adept at preventing agents from undertaking potentially dangerous actions, such as the indiscriminate administration of medication, it does not intrinsically improve the logical reasoning faculties of LLMs. Consequently, TrustAgent’s utility is particularly pronounced in agents that already possess sufficient reasoning skills to manage the complexities introduced by incorporating safety considerations.

evaluation.key_limitations: The claim is only supported by one piece of evidence, which is a case study. More evidence is needed to fully support the claim.

claim.text: Improving the safety and helpfulness of agents is a foundational element of trustworthiness.
claim.exact_quote: This paper addresses the critical issue of agent safety, a foundational element of trustworthiness....Our experimental findings reveal that TrustAgent is effective in enhancing both the safety and helpfulness of agents, thereby contributing to the development of more reliable and trustworthy AI systems.

evidence.evidence_text: This paper addresses the critical issue of agent safety, a foundational element of trustworthiness....Our experimental findings reveal that TrustAgent is effective in enhancing both the safety and helpfulness of agents, thereby contributing to the development of more reliable and trustworthy AI systems.
evidence.exact_quote: This paper addresses the critical issue of agent safety, a foundational element of trustworthiness....Our experimental findings reveal that TrustAgent is effective in enhancing both the safety and helpfulness of agents, thereby contributing to the development of more reliable and trustworthy AI systems.

evaluation.key_limitations: The claim is supported by one piece of evidence, which is a general statement about the importance of safety and helpfulness in trustworthy AI systems. More evidence is needed to fully support the claim.
